message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its immense value, I propose an initial offer of $1200000. This is a special introductory price, reflecting my confidence in its ability to meet your needs.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was hoping we could do better. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $950000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000. This price reflects the product's true value while allowing us to move closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still hoping we can do better. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $850000.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I've carefully considered your latest proposal and am prepared to offer a counteroffer of $1100000. This price maintains a reasonable margin for us while acknowledging your concerns.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still hoping we can do better. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $750000.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. In light of your latest offer, I am prepared to consider a counteroffer of $1000000. This price allows us to maintain a fair balance between our interests.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still hoping we can do better. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $675000.

Thank you for your continued engagement, Bob. Considering your most recent offer, I am prepared to propose a counteroffer of $900000. This price reflects a compromise that respects both our positions.
I appreciate your time and effort, Alice. Unfortunately, I've reached my limit for negotiations. I'll have to consider purchasing the product from John for $1500000.
